Package org.arl.fjage

Class Container

java.lang.Object
org.arl.fjage.Container
Direct Known Subclasses:
MasterContainer, SlaveContainer
public class Container extends Object
Container to manage agent lifecycle. Agents in a container are able to discover services provided by each other, and send or receive messages to each other or common topics. Containers run on a platform. For an example of how containers with agents are created, see RealTimePlatform.

By default, messages sent between agents are not cloned. The developer must ensure that a message or any object contained in the message is not modified after it has been sent or received. During deployment, this default behavior can be changed using setAutoClone(boolean).

    • getName

      public String getName()
      Gets the name of the container.
      Returns:
      name of the container.

    • setCloner

      public void setCloner(String name)
      Sets the cloner to use for deep cloning. Two cloners are currently supported:
      • SERIAL_CLONER -- Cloner using serialization (default) (requires Apache commons-lang v3)
      • FAST_CLONER -- Fast but Groovy incompatible cloner (requires Java deep cloning library)
      Parameters:
      name - name of the cloner to use.

    • clone

      public <T extends Serializable> T clone(T obj)
      Deep clones an object. This is typically used to explicitly clone a message for modification when autocloning is not enabled.
      Parameters:
      obj - object to clone.
      Returns:
      cloned object.

    • setAutoClone

      public void setAutoClone(boolean b)
      Enables or disables autocloning. Autocloning is disabled by default.
      Parameters:
      b - true to enable autocloning, false to disable it.

    • getAutoClone

      public boolean getAutoClone()
      Returns whether autoclone is enabled.
      Returns:
      true if autocloning enabled, false otherwise.

    • add

      public AgentID add(String name, Agent agent)
      Adds an agent to the container.

      Agent names should only contain alphanumeric characters and underscores. The first character should not be a digit. Names with special characters such as '-', '.', '@', etc are considered reserved and should be avoided.

      While agent names inconsistent with this guideline may not be rejected today, they may not work well on all platforms. In future, we may enforce this guideline more strictly.

      Parameters:
      name - name of the agent.
      agent - the agent object.
      Returns:
      an agent id if successful, null on failure.

    • add

      public AgentID add(Agent agent)
      Adds an agent to the container. The name of the agent is automatically chosen.
      Parameters:
      agent - the agent object.
      Returns:
      an agent id if successful, null on failure.

    • containsAgent

      public boolean containsAgent(AgentID aid)
      Checks if an agent exists in the container.
      Parameters:
      aid - agent id to check.
      Returns:
      true if the agent exists, false otherwise.

    • canLocateAgent

      public boolean canLocateAgent(AgentID aid)
      Checks if an agent can be located. If agent in not found in current container, any available remote containers are checked too.
      Parameters:
      aid - agent id to locate.
      Returns:
      true if the agent can be located, false otherwise.

    • getAgent

      public Agent getAgent(AgentID aid)
      Gets an agent given its id. This method only finds agents in the current container.
      Parameters:
      aid - agent id.
      Returns:
      agent associated with the id if exists in the current container, null otherwise.

    • getAgents

      public AgentID[] getAgents()
      Gets all agent ids in the container.
      Returns:
      an array of agent ids.

      Terminates an agent.
      Parameters:
      aid - id of agent to terminate.
      Returns:
      true if successful, false on failure.

      public boolean kill(String name)
      Terminates an agent.
      Parameters:
      name - name of agent to terminate.
      Returns:
      true if successful, false on failure.

    • addListener

      public boolean addListener(MessageListener listener)
      Adds a listener to the container. A listener is able to snoop on all messages passing through the container, and optionally able to ask the container to drop a message.
      Parameters:
      listener - listener.
      Returns:
      true if successfully added, false otherwise.

    • removeListener

      public boolean removeListener(MessageListener listener)
      Removes a listener from the container.
      Parameters:
      listener - listener.
      Returns:
      true if successfully removed, false otherwise.

    • send

      public boolean send(Message m)
      Sends a message. The message is sent to the recipient specified in the message. In case of associated remote containers, the message is only delivered to agents in this container.
      Parameters:
      m - message to deliver
      Returns:
      true if delivered, false otherwise.

    • send

      public boolean send(Message m, boolean relay)
      Sends a message. The message is sent to the recipient specified in the message.
      Parameters:
      m - message to deliver
      relay - enable relaying to associated remote containers.
      Returns:
      true if delivered, false otherwise.

    • subscribe

      public boolean subscribe(AgentID aid, AgentID topic)
      Subscribes an agent to messages sent to a topic.
      Parameters:
      aid - id of agent to subscribe.
      topic - topic to subscribe to.
      Returns:
      true on success, false on failure.

    • unsubscribe

      public boolean unsubscribe(AgentID aid, AgentID topic)
      Unsubscribes an agent from a topic.
      Parameters:
      aid - id of agent to unsubscribe.
      topic - topic to unsubscribe from.
      Returns:
      true on success, false on failure.

    • unsubscribe

      public void unsubscribe(AgentID aid)
      Unsubscribes an agent from all topics.
      Parameters:
      aid - id of agent to unsubscribe.

    • register

      public boolean register(AgentID aid, String service)
      Registers an agent in the directory service as a provider of a named service.
      Parameters:
      aid - id of agent providing the service.
      service - name of the service.
      Returns:
      true on success, false on failure.

      Parameters:

      Returns:

      service - name of the service to deregister.
      Returns:
      true on success, false on failure.

    • deregister

      public void deregister(AgentID aid)
      Deregisters an agent as a provider of all services.
      Parameters:
      aid - id of agent to deregister.

    • initComplete

      protected void initComplete()
      Called when the container is initialized. This is called after all agents have been initialized.

    • start

      protected void start()
      Starts the container and all agents in it. This should be called after init().

    • shutdown

      public void shutdown()
      Terminates the container and all agents in it.

    • isRunning

      public boolean isRunning()
      Checks if the container is currently running.
      Returns:
      true if the container is running, false otherwise.

      public boolean isIdle()
      Checks if all agents in the container are idle.
      Returns:
      true if all agents are idle, false otherwise.

      Gets human readble state information for container.
      Returns:
      state string.
